title: The Friendship by Sophie Blake
description: The Friendship by Sophie Blake. Read by Neet Mohan from the BBC Radio Drama Company. A Top 50 shortlisted story from BBC Radio 2's 500 WORDS 2015 competition, in the 9 and Under category.
